description: Stops one or more job runs for a specified job definition.

parameters.name: JobName
parameters.description: The name of the job definition for which to stop job runs.

parameters.name: JobRunIds
parameters.description: A list of the JobRunIds that should be stopped for that job definition. (string) ---

nested_items.name: SuccessfulSubmissions
nested_items.description: A list of the JobRuns that were successfully submitted for stopping.

nested_items.name: JobName
nested_items.description: The name of the job definition used in the job run that was stopped.

nested_items.name: JobRunId
nested_items.description: The JobRunId of the job run that was stopped.

nested_items.name: Errors
nested_items.description: A list of the errors that were encountered in trying to stop JobRuns, including the JobRunId for which each error was encountered and details about the error.

nested_items.name: JobName
nested_items.description: The name of the job definition that is used in the job run in question.

nested_items.name: JobRunId
nested_items.description: The JobRunId of the job run in question.

nested_items.name: ErrorDetail
nested_items.description: Specifies details about the error that was encountered.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The code associated with this error.
